article_title: At Old Capitol, Clinton invokes Kennedy, Lincoln, blames Trump for inciting violence

article_metadata.description:
At the Old State Capitol in Springfield Monday, Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton invoked a famous Abraham Lincoln speech given there in accusing Republican frontrunner Donald Trump of inciting violence at his own rallies.
Her afternoon appearance was to tape a town hall meeting that aired Monday evening – on the eve of Tuesday’s Illinois primary – on MSNBC.
At the event, host Chris Matthews played video of the late U.S. Sen. Robert Kennedy telling a crowd in
